game.name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location
game.shortDescription: Welcome to Circus Baby's Pizza World, where family fun and interactivity go beyond anything you've seen at those *other* pizza places! Now hiring: Late night technician. Must enjoy cramped spaces and be comfortable around active machinery. Not responsible for death or dismemberment.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to Circus Baby's Pizza World, where family fun and interactivity go beyond anything you've seen at those *other* pizza places! Now hiring: Late night technician. Must enjoy cramped spaces and be comfortable around active machinery. Not responsible for death or dismemberment.

reviewHighlights.text: 당신은 아버지의 더러운 진실이 묻힌 지하 시설 '시스터 로케이션'에 도착합니다. 이곳에서 당신의 여동생이 씌인 기괴한 로봇을 만나게 되는데.. 정말 살아남을 수 있을까요..?
제가 기어서 다니는데 감히 발로라??;; 파란색. 호강합니다. 감사합니다.
